answers.author: Toni Cramer
answers.text:
Bellevue has a replacement schedule and policies for all technology (building systems, applications, servers, network, pc's, etc.). When something new is acquired, it's purchase price includes an amortized amt for replacement ongoing. IT manages inventory, replacement schedules and the replacement fund.  current replacement schedule for standard PC is 4 years.

author: Ana Bradshaw
text:
I'm trying to find additional information on how municipalities handle computer replacement.
Do any municipalities have a defined PC replacement policy? How often are computers replaced? How is replacement budgeted?
title: Computer Replacement
